name: livelihood
description: LiveliHood is a web app designed to help those who are more vulnerable to COVID-19 complete daily tasks, such as shopping at a populated grocery store. This web app allows kind-hearted users to visualize tasks in their neighbourhood on a map and volunteer to help complete them.

scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && node src/index.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
